Zinzy Waleson Geene

16 years at the intersection of research, design, leadership, and strategy

I'm a Design Manager presently part of Leeruniek, where we take a data-driven approach to equitable education.

I'm blessed with a profession that's a sweet mix of some of the things I love: empathizing with people who use a product or service, crafting solutions for their problems, mentoring the people who do the same, and organizing how we do our work.

At Leeruniek, I'm a strategic Design Manager focused on product and service design. We take a data-driven approach to equitable education, and I cherish being a part of that beautiful journey.

I use my skills and experience to build teams, products, services, and habits

I'm a Design Manager

How I work

  • Add WD-40 to teams, habits, products, services. When it comes to improve how my team does the right thing, I know repair is often better than disruption.
  • I'm a strategic generalist, choosing my methods and modes based on the challenge at hand. Sometimes, lorem ipsum is fine.
  • Ask questions and question answers, forever
